articles.title: Christie says he plans to stay in GOP race through convention
articles.description: Former New Jersey Governor Chris Christie said he’s not discouraged by a recent CNN poll that shows him trailing Trump and former South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley, and dismissed the possibility of working with Haley or dropping out early to consolidate support behind a candidate who can mount a serious challenge to Trump, the clear frontrunner in the race.
articles.content:
